.. _Installation:

Installation
============

(SOON) To install from pip:

.. code-block:: bash

    pip install fucciphase

If you wish to install it from source:
    
.. code-block:: bash

    git clone https://github.com/nobias-fht/fucciphase
    cd fucciphase
    pip install -e .

To use the notebooks, also install jupyter:
    
.. code-block:: bash

    pip install jupyter
